author: Dennis Owens
title: Dozen Senate, 11 Governor candidates meet Pennsylvania primary petition deadline

sentence: A super PAC supporting Rep. Conor Lamb for U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania made two misleading claims about the Democratic front-runner, John Fetterman, one of which resulted in a Philadelphia TV station pulling the ad.
author: Robert Farley
title: Pro-Lamb Super PAC Misfires in Attack Ad Against Fetterman

sentence: Conor Lamb is attacking his party's frontrunner, John Fetterman, for seeking the endorsement of a "democratic socialist" and being a "silver spooned socialist."
author: Wendy Daughenbaugh
title: How former President Donald Trump is impacting the Senate race, PA Primary

author: Julian Routh
title: Front-runner Fetterman defends his platform, 2013 Braddock incident in Democratic U.S. Senate debate

author: Julian Routh
title: Fetterman defends platform, 2013 Braddock incident in fiery Democratic U.S. Senate debate
